---
title: "bug_report.yml"
---

## High-level description
This file defines a bug report template for the Flipt project hosted on GitHub. It structures the information users should provide when submitting bug reports, ensuring consistency and completeness. 

## Symbols
### `name`
#### Description
Specifies the name of the issue template as it appears in the GitHub issue creation dropdown.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `description`
#### Description
Provides a brief description of the template's purpose, displayed when selecting the template.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `title`
#### Description
Sets a default title prefix for issues created using this template.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `labels`
#### Description
Defines default labels automatically applied to issues created with this template.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `body`
#### Description
This section constitutes the core of the template, defining the structure and content of the bug report form. It utilizes a YAML list to define various input fields.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
Each list item represents an input field with properties like `type`, `id`, `attributes` (containing label, description, placeholder), and `validations`. The template leverages:
- `textarea` for free-text input (bug description, steps to reproduce, etc.)
- `checkboxes` for confirmations (searching for existing issues)
- `markdown` for static content and instructions (exporting data).
